Class Manifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manifest

  • public class Manifest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the creation and parsing of manifest files. The manifest file includes the file size of all the video segments.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manifest(java.lang.String filename)
      Construct manifest object from file.
      Manifest(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String ext)
      Get the file size of all the video segments in the specified path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getVideoSegmentAmount()
      Get the total number of video segments.
      long getVideoSegmentLength(int i)
      Get the file length of a specified video segment.
      void write(java.lang.String path)
      Write manifest to the specified file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manifest

        public Manifest(java.lang.String path,
                java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String ext)
        Get the file size of all the video segments in the specified path. The filename of video segments in the path should follow the pattern: path/name_{num}.mp4
        Parameters:
        path - should be a dir.
        filename - name of manifest.
        ext - file extension of manifest file.

      • Manifest

        public Manifest(java.lang.String filename)
        Construct manifest object from file.
        Parameters:
        filename - is the path to the manifest file.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String path)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                  java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Write manifest to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the manifest file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the path not exists.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when utf8 not supported.

      • getVideoSegmentLength

        public long getVideoSegmentLength(int i)
        Get the file length of a specified video segment.
        Parameters:
        i - identifier of video segment.
        Returns:
        size of video segment.

      • getVideoSegmentAmount

        public int getVideoSegmentAmount()
        Get the total number of video segments.
        Returns:
        the total of video segments.
